hed: Behold The Most Amazing Glitter Cat Eye Ever, Straight From NYFW
dek: Because backstage is closer than the front row.

items.caption: [New York Fashion Week spring/summer 2016](http://www.teenvogue.com/tag/new-york%20fashion%20week) is in full drive, and that means the most epic beauty inspiration. Each day, the *Teen Vogue* beauty team is going behind-the-scenes backstage to talk all things makeup, hair, and skin with the top glam squads in the entire world. Which means that, in addition to all the amazing clothes floating down the runway, we get the first look at the prettiest trends that will most likely make their way into beauty's mainstream in the coming months. Stay tuned for the epic gorgeousness. First up, the most killer cat eye we’ve ever seen, complete with full-on gold glitter.

items.title: Creatures of the Wind
items.caption: Makeup artist [Aaron de Mey](https://instagram.com/aarondemey1/?hl=en) for [Nars Cosmetics](https://instagram.com/narsissist/) created the most out-of-this-world glam rock liner look. For some of the models, he topped the extended inky feline flick with a coating of punk rock gold glitter. Paired with a bright, fire engine-red lip…this is what beauty dreams are made of.

items.title: Creatures of the Wind
items.caption: “The look was inspired by singer, Siouxsie Sioux. She always had a very strong eye look — it had the same spirit, but was applied differently each time. The look is very eclectic with a lot of layering, which plays off the layering in the collection,” says de Mey. He used a combination of [Nars Black Valley Eye Paint](http://www.narscosmetics.com/USA/black-valley-eye-paint/0607845081418.html#q=black+valley&start=1), [Black Moon Eyeliner Pencil](http://www.narscosmetics.com/USA/black-moon-eyeliner-pencil/0607845080039.html#q=black+moon&start=4) and [Via Veneto Larger Than Life Eyeliner](http://www.narscosmetics.com/USA/via-veneto-larger-than-life-long-wear-eyeliner/0607845080510.html#q=via+veneto&start=4) to achieve this punky eye moment.

items.title: Creatures of the Wind
items.caption: “It's punk...tough looking. I love the richness of the gold against the toughness of the black. It’s an updated, modernized take on eyeliner,” says De Mey. We couldn’t agree more. And although this might not be school-appropriate, we think that whenever you can incorporate edgy sparkles into your look, why wouldn’t you? Use [Nars Eye Paint in Iskander](http://www.narscosmetics.com/USA/iskandar-eye-paint/0607845081500.html), then press the shimmer and shine up to your brow for a graphic effect. Wear your hair mussed up like the models at the show for an effortlessly cool vibe.

socialDescription: Because backstage is closer than the front row.
seoTitle: Behold The Most Amazing Glitter Cat Eye Ever, Straight From NYFW
seoDescription: Best hair and makeup looks from New York Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2016.

fields.name: Emily Gaynor
fields.bio:
__What sort of advice would you give your 18-year-old self?__ 

I wish I would have known that everything works out in the end and if it didn’t, it most likely wasn’t meant to be. I stressed out over a lot of things—looking back I realize how big a waste of time that is. 

__What’s your favorite Teen Vogue moment?__ 

I have so many amazing *Teen Vogue* memories. I think my favorite was assisting on the Leighton Meester February 2009 cover shoot back when I was an intern. I was obsessed with Gossip Girl, and being on set in the LES with Leighton and Patrick Demachelier was definitely one the highlights of my entire college experience. At one point I had to stop pedestrians from walking into the shot and I remember thinking I’ve made it. Haha.

__Share a funny anecdote from a first job or internship.__ 

On my first day of my first internship, EVER, at *Teen Vogue* my purse hit the elevator alarm and the elevator stopped mid-ride—it was completely packed, too. I was mortified.  

__What beauty product are you loving right now?__

I can’t get enough of the Maybelline Master Kajal black liner. I love kohl-rimmed liner and this one is perfect. I also love that as it wears down you get an even more smudgy, smoky, rock ’n’ roll vibe. It’s basically the gift that keeps on giving. 

__What fashion item seems to always be on your shopping list?__ 

I can never have enough pairs of black jeans, but right now I’m in the market for overalls, culottes and a denim dress. 

__What’s your go-to karaoke song?__ 

"You Oughta Know” by Alanis Morissette, of course. 

__Who’s your favorite model and why?__ 

Well, it’s hard to pick, because I love models. But right now, I’m loving Cat McNeil. She’s confident, quirky and has amazing tattoos. 

__What’s your favorite Instagram to follow (other than Teen Vogue)?__ 

I follow a ton of models that I love, but right now my favorite Instagram is [@theacademynewyork](https://instagram.com/theacademynewyork/). They post really out-there images and quotes. And anything cat-related is always an instant-follow. 

__What’s your favorite meal?__ 

Tacos! All day, every day.
fields.title: Digital Beauty Editor
